scripts.postinstall: sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y
scripts.fontsinstall: apt-get update && apt-get install -y libatk1.0-0 libatk-bridge2.0-0 libcups2 libdrm2 libxkbcommon-x11-0 libxcomposite1 libxdamage1 libxrandr2 libgbm1 libasound2 libpangocairo-1.0-0 libpangoft2-1.0-0 libgtk-3-0 libnss3 libxss1 libgconf-2-4 libxtst6 libxshmfence1 libglu1-mesa
scripts.azure-start: npm install && npm run postinstall && npm run loadchrome && npm start
